name: Yeenoghu
description: Yeenoghu, Demon Prince of Gnolls, Master of Dark Beasts, revels in beastial strength and savagery.  He appears as a massive horned gnoll, his fiersome spiked flail always ready to flay anyone in his way.  His favored people, the gnolls, are often the focus of his attention, as he seeks to aid them against their enemies, and manipulate them into doing his bidding.
